rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall leading to living areas and central courtyard.
Open-plan living area with access to the courtyard.
Modern kitchen adjacent to dining area, designed for efficient workflow and ventilation.
Dining space adjoining the living room with views of the courtyard.
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and personal balcony facing east to harness morning energy as per Vastu.
Secondary bedroom ensuring privacy and peaceful atmosphere with a small window for natural light.
Common bathroom serving both bedrooms, designed with ample ventilation and natural lighting.
